name: WordMaster (itch) (andyhoff)
description:
WordMaster is my first attempt at coding, so it is very basic. I'm working on creating a leaderboard next.

Seven random letters are chosen, and you have to make as many words as possible in a minute. 

  • Letter points:
    • AEIOULNSTR = 1 pt
    • DG = 2 pts
    • BCMP = 3 pts
    • FHVWY = 4 pts
    • K = 5 pts
    • JX = 8 pts
    • QZ = 10 pts
  • Word length:
    • 3 letters = 1 pt
    • 4 letters = 2 pts
    • 5 letters = 3 pts
    • 6 letters = 5 pts
    • 7 letters = 8 pts
    • 8 or more letters = 10 pts
